Package me.KrazyManJ.KrazyEngine.Any.Text

Class Gradient

java.lang.Object
me.KrazyManJ.KrazyEngine.Any.Text.Gradient
public final class Gradient extends Object
Creates text gradients

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static @NotNull String
    rgb(String text, Color startColor, Color endColor)
    Makes text gradient in rgb model, this model adds/subtracts each color (red, green, blue) in proportion related to text length.
    static @NotNull String
    rgb(String text, String startColor, String endColor)
    Makes text gradient in rgb model, this model adds/subtracts each color (red, green, blue) in proportion related to text length.

  • Method Details

    • rgb

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String rgb(String text, Color startColor, Color endColor)
      Makes text gradient in rgb model, this model adds/subtracts each color (red, green, blue) in proportion related to text length.

      Also supports legacy formatting &[klmnor], where r resets legacy format only

      Parameters:
      text - Text to make gradient text with
      startColor - Color to start gradient with
      endColor - Color to end gradient with
      Returns:
      Text with gradient

    • rgb

      @NotNull public static @NotNull String rgb(String text, String startColor, String endColor)
      Makes text gradient in rgb model, this model adds/subtracts each color (red, green, blue) in proportion related to text length.

      Also supports legacy formatting &[klmnor], where r resets legacy format only

      Parameters:
      text - Text to make gradient text with
      startColor - Color to start gradient with
      endColor - Color to end gradient with
      Returns:
      Text with gradient
